title: Hi, im new here, here are some of my works please criticize them
content:
Ive uploaded some Cellular wallpapers i made to a website called mobilehood

please criticize my works by rating them in mobilhood u have a rating bar near the image of the wallpaper

btw im participating a competition in this website and i can win an iPod Touch so your ratings are helping me very much

Here are the links:

[http://www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=755](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205065552/http:/www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=755 "http://www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=755")

[http://www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=756](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205065552/http:/www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=756 "http://www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=756")

[http://www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=754](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205065552/http:/www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=754 "http://www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=754")

[http://www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=677](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205065552/http:/www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=677 "http://www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=677")

[http://www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=676](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205065552/http:/www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=676 "http://www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=676")

[http://www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=675](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205065552/http:/www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=675 "http://www.mobilhood.com/index.php?atn=oi&id=675")

thank you all very much, i appreciate your help.

if its not the right place for this topic please move it to the right section

 [‹ Futura Logo help](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205065552/http:/typophile.com/node/52229 "Go to previous forum topic") [Something I've been dabbling with ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205065552/http:/typophile.com/node/52115 "Go to next forum topic")
author: yaliars

comments.content:
This is more of a logo design forum, not a “help me win an iPod” forum.

- Lex

There is no section called _greed_ on typophile, so I suggest you leave.

—-

Bas Dirks

too funny ... do I need to post porn in this thread to get it deleted?

—————  
**Paul Ducco**  
 [Graphic Design Melbourne](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205065552/http:/www.solid-creative.com/)
